description: Create generator page with URL input
steps: See input field for website URL
URL field is optional (can be skipped)
Page has clear heading explaining the step
Question asks: What type of website is this?
Options: Personal Blog, Business Website, E-commerce, SaaS, Mobile App, Other
Question asks: What personal information do you collect?
Options are checkboxes: Name, Email, Phone, Address, Payment info, DOB, Govt ID, Photos
Include None of the above option
Question asks: How do you collect this information?
Options are checkboxes: Contact forms, Account signup, Newsletter, Checkout, Cookies, Social login, User content
Question asks: What do you use this data for?
Options are checkboxes: Providing services, Processing orders, Marketing emails, Customer support, Analytics, Personalization, Legal compliance
Question asks: Do you share data with third parties?
Options are checkboxes: Payment processors, Email services, Analytics, Advertising, Cloud hosting, CRM tools, No sharing
Question asks: Do you use cookies?
Options are radio buttons: Essential only, Analytics cookies, Advertising cookies, All types, No cookies
Question asks: What can users do with their data?
Options are checkboxes: View data, Download data, Request deletion, Opt out of marketing, All of the above
All of the above selects all options
